title: Potassium Magnesium Citrate
overview: Potassium Magnesium Citrate is a highly soluble mineral complex that combines the benefits of potassium and magnesium with citric acid for enhanced bioavailability. Known for its ability to support cardiovascular health, electrolyte balance, and kidney function, this compound is essential for maintaining proper cellular activity. Potassium Magnesium Citrate appears as a white, odorless, crystalline powder and is well-tolerated in various formulations.
features: Supports electrolyte balance, aiding in proper muscle function and hydration
Promotes cardiovascular health by helping regulate blood pressure levels
Aids in kidney stone prevention through its alkalizing effect
Highly bioavailable for optimal absorption of potassium and magnesium
Suitable for use in formulations targeting muscle cramps, fatigue, and heart health

applications.title: Pharmaceutical
applications.description: Used in supplements for cardiovascular support, muscle health, and electrolyte replenishment

applications.title: Nutraceutical
applications.description: Popular in health supplements aimed at improving kidney function, preventing kidney stones, and maintaining electrolyte balance

applications.title: Food
applications.description: Potentially used in electrolyte beverages and fortified foods (subject to regional regulations)
